## Time Investment

| Phase | Focus | Time |
|-------|-------|------|
| Phase 1 | Setup | ~15 min |
| Phase 2 | First Use | ~20 min |
| Phase 3 | Daily Work | ~40 min |
| Phase 4 | Advanced | ~60 min |

**Minimum to get started:** Phases 1-2 (~35 min)

**Full proficiency:** All phases (~2.5 hours, spread over first week)
